attributes.action: Let me join ther army at my age and train meup good and then i am willing to do any mission are country wants me to!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am 15 years old and i am willing to learn to fight at my age to be able to train up till i am 18 and then  serve this country till the end of my life and also i will be willing to do any mission which no one would be willing to do and also i am not scared of dying for my country please train me up Mr brown and also please can you try to get back to me because i am willing to leave my education and do this. Please Sir can you let me do this so i can prove to the world that are country have young brave patriots. Thank you Sir.

rejection.details: Please make your petition more general. For example, you may want to request in the title of your petition that the government lowers the age  that people can join the army.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
